about_the_game:
From the creator of Chicken Feet comes Below Nowhere, a first-person survival horror game that will pull you into the depths of evil.

Trapped in a strange reality, you find yourself exploring memories that don’t belong to you. Despite each seeming isolated, they all share a tragic similarity; dried bloodshed of unknown origins. These are the places that the Meat Man thrives in. Brave the darkness and outsmart him to escape each memory. During your adventure, something begins to stir deep inside your soul: A memory, lost among the many others, longing to be remembered.

MEET THE MEAT MAN

  • You aren't alone. The Meat Man feasts on evil and death.

  • A trickster, the animalistic Meat Man likes to play with his food.

  • The Meat Man enjoys causing you pain and suffering more than anything.

REPAIR YOUR BODY PARTS

  • The Meat Man will try to rip you apart piece by piece. Individual body parts can be injured, altering your abilities.

  • When heavily damaged, be wise! Medicine bottles are scarce. Be smart about the body parts you heal first.

  • When your body is entirely exhausted, any extra injury will be fatal.

EXPLORE A PLACE BELOW NOWHERE

  • Descend into the darkness and voyage through strange memories that aren't yours.

  • The vicious Meat Man will be hunting you. Use the environment to your advantage and hide in the darkness where he can't see you.

  • Mysterious white glowing doorways mark your escape. Reach them to be spared by the Meat Man.

You have no way of defending yourself. Your only choices are to run, hide, or die.

Features an original dark ambient soundtrack composed by The Nomad Communion.

Proudly built with Unreal Engine 5.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of violence and blood.

name: Below Nowhere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A man made of red flesh is looking for you. He is the Meat Man. Below Nowhere is a first-person survival horror game that will pull you into the depths of evil. While exploring strange memories that aren't yours, you will be pushed to your limits in this terrifying tale of humanity.
